title: Cannot explain how sick I am of smurfs...
body:
I'm in SIlver 5 at the moment and I'm going okay with my games.... EXCEPT FOR WHEN THERE IS A SMURF WHICH THERE ALWAYS IS

The other day I laned against a Diamond smurf and got absolutely wrecked.

2 out of the three games I played last night I laned against the same Plat smurf and had a Plat ADC smurf on the enemy team in two consecutive games

First game I play today, a Diamond smurf in the jungle and a Plat smurf ADC..

AND THEN I FINALLY GET ONE ON MY TEAM. Plat Smurf who went top lane as Renekton... He went 2/7/2 and afk'd...

Is there anything that can be done about smurfs?....

replies.body:
1. Just because they say they are a smurf doesn't mean they are
2. Just because they are better than you, doesn't mean they are a smurf

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=6UW2fLnE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-05T05:09:52.593+0000)

> 2. Just because they are better than you, doesn't mean they are a smurf

lmao i am fully aware and do not get angry when someone is better than me

but a couple of them added me to their accounts after the game just to prove it because I didn't believe them

Ya its hard to jump into a game when you just wanna play and have fun but then you're getting your but kicked. After abut 10 minutes of figuring out how much better than us they are I just mentally give up and wait for 15 so I can spam that surrender button to move onto next game.

I'm not sure if I've had to face a smurf, (probs have) but I have a friend who does smurf because he gets a lot of shit when he plays norms on his main account in a role or character he doesn't play. People saying "why are you so bad for xxxx division???" Y'know, just being real jerks. So he then moves onto ranked to practice the character and role. The person you had, the Plat smurf, maybe they aren't confident in top lane or playing Renekton?  I think some of them have their reasons, I'm sure it sucks, but we can't really do much about it unfortunately. :s Sorry you're having a rough time in any case!

Ya its hard to jump into a game when you just wanna play and have fun but then you're getting your but kicked. After abut 10 minutes of figuring out how much better than us they are I just mentally give up and wait for 15 so I can spam that surrender button to move onto next game.

A lot of people in silver get a few early kills, (by luck, or by their opponent being retarded. not by skill) and they snowball and kill idiots who cannot position, 100% of silver players. And when they are 10/0 that's usually when they claim to be a diamond smurf.

I would say you most likely play with, or against a smurf in around 1 in 20 games.

Unfortunately they are at all ELOs and unfortunately, there are absolutely no rules again it. Sharing an account is a big no no but if it's their own individual account, there is absolutely nothing wrong with it. Frustrating I know, because I get a lot of high plat/diamond smurfs in gold and it's the same thing. My lane goes from "this is pretty easy" to "ok this is pretty challenging and I can't make mistakes". I was high plat last season and have since dropped to low gold so it's obvious when I get someone that is smurfing

>2 out of the three games I played last night I laned against the same Plat smurf

Get a smurf in my game?

Queue instantly so i can be up against the same smurf.
I actually took a 5 minute break lol
Chances are none of them were smurfs. Git gud
